data.actual_result: Text triggers the suggested mentions menu as if there was @ preceding it, selected letters dont work, shift is selected
data.expected_result: Typing would trigger no response from the app, and text would appear as it does when typing any message
data.short_description: When mentioning someone and editing text/typing before the @, tags of other users will pop up as if making a new mention
data.steps_to_repro: - mention someone - move cursor to space before the @ - start typing
